task.title: Sort Records
task.shortdesc: Sort records in an existing session by start time.

step.cmd: Choose the Session Sort records... menu item.
step.stepresult: The Sort Records dialog will appear.

step.cmd: Click the Sort by: menu and select a tier by which to sort your records. For example, you may sort your records in chronological order (by choosing Segment), or alphabetically by their Orthography.

stepresult.note: You may choose up to three tiers by which to sort your records; they will be sorted by the first chosen tier, and then records with the same information in the first tier will be sorted by the next chosen tier, and so forth.

step.cmd: By default, records will be sorted in ascending order. To sort in descending order by any tier, select descending.
When you have finished selecting sort options, click Ok. If you do not wish to sort records at this time, click Cancel.
step.stepresult: The records for the current session will be sorted by the tier(s) you have chosen.
